name: npm-next
description: wraps the latest version of npm for testing

scripts.selfupdate: npm install --save npm@next --cache-min=0 && npm run commit
scripts.commit: export NPM_VERSION=$(npm info npm@next version --cache-min=Infinity); git add . && git commit -m "Upgrade to npm@$NPM_VERSION"

author: Tim Oxley <secoif@gmail.com>
